mapper.select: select r.*, b.board_title, b.price, m.member_savename, nvl(msg.latest_message_num,0) as last_m_num, nvl(rc.readcount,0) as readcount from room r join board b on b.board_num = r.board_num join member m on m.id = case when r.buyer = #{buyer} then r.seller else r.buyer end left join ( select room_num, max(message_num) as latest_message_num from message group by room_num ) msg on msg.room_num = r.room_num left join( select room_num, count(case when readcount = 1 then 1 end) as readcount from message where sender!=#{buyer} group by room_num ) rc on rc.room_num = r.room_num where r.buyer = #{buyer} or r.seller = #{buyer} order by last_m_num desc, r.room_num desc
select * from room where board_num=#{board_num} and seller=#{seller} and buyer=#{buyer}
select r.room_num,count(m.readcount) as readcount from room r join message m on m.room_num = r.room_num and m.readcount = 1 group by r.room_num
